TopicTitle: I took a single screenshot of all Jool's moons

Articles.Content:
I was flying a fuel tank with a Kerbal strapped on the front to Eeloo and back for the Fly to Eeloo and Back with 2 fuel tanks No Refueling Challenge. Since it takes alot of delta-v for a plane change I decided that a Jool flyby would do the trick. Since I am filming the submission to make a video I slowely warped towards Jool when I saw Laythe, Vall and Tylo. This is pretty normal around Jool since the moons are so big, BUT then I noticed the 2 small glowing specs above Jool. I moved my mouse to make sure they were moons and not stars, now I present this image:

Here's the original screenshot:

Neat shot, we have the whole quintette for sure.

... is it possible for sarnus too, you think? I'm thinking about a picture from Hale, while close to Ovok, after waiting for the 3 others to be at the right place

1 hour ago, MinimalMinmus said:

Neat shot, we have the whole quintette for sure.

... is it possible for sarnus too, you think? I'm thinking about a picture from Hale, while close to Ovok, after waiting for the 3 others to be at the right place

You know what? I am currently working on a ship for the Jool-Sarnus 10 challenge and I plan on refueling at Hale, I will try to get a screenshot of the moons for you. OOH I JUST REMEMBERED. I'll gets Sarnus's rings too assuming they don't cover up the other moons.

4 hours ago, JacobJHC said:

You know what? I am currently working on a ship for the Jool-Sarnus 10 challenge and I plan on refueling at Hale, I will try to get a screenshot of the moons for you. OOH I JUST REMEMBERED. I'll gets Sarnus's rings too assuming they don't cover up the other moons.

I can't wait for the picture, it's probably going to be my wallpaper or something.

How are your eyes so good that you could spot the moons and identify them? All I see is Laythe ... 

Nice picture anyway.

6 hours ago, The Space Dino said:

How are your eyes so good that you could spot the moons and identify them? All I see is Laythe ... 

Nice picture anyway.

I could see the larger 3 moons easily. However when I saw a yellow chunk and recognized it at Pol. I got excited and then went to the map view and saw that Bop was also on the same side of Jool. Since I couldn't see it I pointed the ship towards it then held the right mouse button and slowly shift the camera until one of the stars began to turn white to brown and back to white. It was Bop! So I made sure I could see them all in one go then I took the screenshot.
